**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 601 4.0 **Price** 4,500 gp **Usage** held in 1 hand **Bulk** 1 **Base Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31) --- The gleaming _holy avenger_ is the iconic weapon of powerful [paladins](/Causes.aspx?ID=1). The crossbar of this _+2 greater striking [holy](/Equipment.aspx?ID=299) [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_ is styled to look like angel wings. Tradition holds that those who see their reflection in a _holy avenger's_ highly polished blade have their faults laid bare. If you are evil, you are [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13) while carrying or wielding this weapon. **Paladin Wielder** If you're a [champion](/Classes.aspx?ID=4) of the paladin cause, you also gain the following two benefits.
  • When you critically hit an evil creature with the _holy avenger_, the creature is [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) and enfeebled 2 for 1 round.
  • You can activate the sword in the following way.
**Craft Requirements** You are a champion with the paladin cause; supply a casting of _detect alignment_ and _dispel magic_. The initial raw materials must include 120 gp of cold iron.
name: Holy Avenger
